00189 void FromCellToScreenCoordinates( INT16 sCellX, INT16 sCellY, INT16 *psScreenX, INT16 *psScreenY )
00190 {
00191       *psScreenX = ( 2 * sCellX ) - ( 2 * sCellY );
00192       *psScreenY = sCellX + sCellY;
00193 
00194 }
00195 
00196 void FromScreenToCellCoordinates( INT16 sScreenX, INT16 sScreenY, INT16 *psCellX, INT16 *psCellY )
00197 {
00198       *psCellX = ( ( sScreenX + ( 2 * sScreenY ) ) / 4 ); 
00199       *psCellY = ( ( 2 * sScreenY ) - sScreenX ) / 4; 
00200 }
00201 
00202 // These two functions take into account that our world is projected and attached
00203 // to the screen (0,0) in a specific way, and we MUSt take that into account then
00204 // determining screen coords
00205 
00206 void FloatFromCellToScreenCoordinates( FLOAT dCellX, FLOAT dCellY, FLOAT *pdScreenX, FLOAT *pdScreenY )
00207 {
00208       FLOAT       dScreenX, dScreenY;
00209       
00210       dScreenX = ( 2 * dCellX ) - ( 2 * dCellY );
00211       dScreenY = dCellX + dCellY;
00212 
00213       *pdScreenX = dScreenX;
00214       *pdScreenY = dScreenY;
00215 }
00216 
00217 void FloatFromScreenToCellCoordinates( FLOAT dScreenX, FLOAT dScreenY, FLOAT *pdCellX, FLOAT *pdCellY )
00218 {
00219       FLOAT dCellX, dCellY;
00220 
00221       dCellX = ( ( dScreenX + ( 2 * dScreenY ) ) / 4 ); 
00222       dCellY = ( ( 2 * dScreenY ) - dScreenX ) / 4; 
00223 
00224       *pdCellX = dCellX;
00225       *pdCellY = dCellY;

00229 BOOLEAN GetMouseXY( INT16 *psMouseX, INT16 *psMouseY )
00230 {
00231       INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
00232 
00233       if ( !GetMouseWorldCoords( &sWorldX, &sWorldY ) )
00234       {
00235             (*psMouseX) = 0;
00236             (*psMouseY) = 0;
00237             return( FALSE );
00238       }
00239 
00240       // Find start block
00241       (*psMouseX) = ( sWorldX / CELL_X_SIZE );
00242       (*psMouseY) = ( sWorldY / CELL_Y_SIZE );
00243 
00244       return( TRUE );
00245 }

00248 BOOLEAN GetMouseXYWithRemainder( INT16 *psMouseX, INT16 *psMouseY, INT16 *psCellX, INT16 *psCellY )
00249 {
00250       INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
00251 
00252       if ( !GetMouseWorldCoords( &sWorldX, &sWorldY ) )
00253       {
00254             return( FALSE );
00255       }
00256 
00257       // Find start block
00258       (*psMouseX) = ( sWorldX / CELL_X_SIZE );
00259       (*psMouseY) = ( sWorldY / CELL_Y_SIZE );
00260 
00261       (*psCellX ) = sWorldX - ( (*psMouseX) * CELL_X_SIZE );
00262       (*psCellY ) = sWorldY - ( (*psMouseY) * CELL_Y_SIZE );
00263 
00264 
00265       return( TRUE );
00266 }

00269 BOOLEAN GetMouseWorldCoords( INT16 *psMouseX, INT16 *psMouseY )
00270 {
00271       INT16 sOffsetX, sOffsetY;
00272       INT16 sTempPosX_W, sTempPosY_W;
00273       INT16 sStartPointX_W, sStartPointY_W;
00274        
00275       // Convert mouse screen coords into offset from center
00276   if ( ! ( gViewportRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA ) )
00277       {
00278             *psMouseX = 0;
00279             *psMouseY = 0;
00280             return( FALSE );
00281       }
00282 
00283       sOffsetX = gViewportRegion.MouseXPos - ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2 ); // + gsRenderWorldOffsetX;
00284       sOffsetY = gViewportRegion.MouseYPos - ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2 ) + 10;// + gsRenderWorldOffsetY;
00285 
00286       // OK, Let's offset by a value if our interfac level is changed!
00287       if ( gsInterfaceLevel != 0 )
00288       {
00289             //sOffsetY -= 50;
00290       }
00291 
00292 
00293       FromScreenToCellCoordinates( sOffsetX, sOffsetY, &sTempPosX_W, &sTempPosY_W );
00294 
00295       // World start point is Render center plus this distance
00296       sStartPointX_W = gsRenderCenterX + sTempPosX_W;
00297       sStartPointY_W = gsRenderCenterY + sTempPosY_W;
00298 
00299 
00300       // check if we are out of bounds..
00301   if ( sStartPointX_W < 0 || sStartPointX_W >= WORLD_COORD_ROWS || sStartPointY_W < 0 || sStartPointY_W >= WORLD_COORD_COLS )
00302       {
00303             *psMouseX = 0;
00304             *psMouseY = 0;
00305             return( FALSE );
00306       }
00307 
00308       // Determine Start block and render offsets
00309       // Find start block
00310       // Add adjustment for render origin as well
00311       (*psMouseX) = sStartPointX_W;
00312       (*psMouseY) = sStartPointY_W;
00313 
00314       return( TRUE );
00315 }
00316 
00317 
00318 BOOLEAN GetMouseWorldCoordsInCenter( INT16 *psMouseX, INT16 *psMouseY )
00319 {
00320       INT16 sMouseX, sMouseY;
00321 
00322       // Get grid position
00323       if ( !GetMouseXY( &sMouseX, &sMouseY ) )
00324       {
00325             return( FALSE );
00326       }
00327 
00328       // Now adjust these cell coords into world coords
00329       *psMouseX = ( ( sMouseX  ) * CELL_X_SIZE ) + ( CELL_X_SIZE / 2 );
00330       *psMouseY = ( ( sMouseY  ) * CELL_Y_SIZE ) + ( CELL_Y_SIZE / 2 );
00331 
00332 
00333       return( TRUE );
00334 }

00341 
00342 BOOLEAN GetMouseMapPos( INT16 *psMapPos )
00343 {
00344        INT16                        sWorldX, sWorldY;
00345        static                       INT16   sSameCursorPos;
00346        static                       UINT32      uiOldFrameNumber = 99999;
00347 
00348        // Check if this is the same frame as before, return already calculated value if so!
00349        if ( uiOldFrameNumber == guiGameCycleCounter && !guiForceRefreshMousePositionCalculation )
00350        {
00351              ( *psMapPos ) = sSameCursorPos;
00352 
00353              if ( sSameCursorPos == 0 )
00354              {    
00355                         return( FALSE );
00356              }
00357              return( TRUE );
00358        }
00359 
00360        uiOldFrameNumber = guiGameCycleCounter;
00361        guiForceRefreshMousePositionCalculation = FALSE;
00362 
00363 
00364        if ( GetMouseXY( &sWorldX, &sWorldY ) )
00365        {
00366                   *psMapPos = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sWorldY, sWorldX );
00367                   sSameCursorPos = (*psMapPos);
00368                   return( TRUE );
00369        }
00370        else
00371        {
00372               *psMapPos = 0;
00373                   sSameCursorPos = (*psMapPos);
00374                   return( FALSE );
00375        }
00376 
00377 }

00381 BOOLEAN ConvertMapPosToWorldTileCenter( UINT16 usMapPos, INT16 *psXPos, INT16 *psYPos )
00382 {
00383       INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
00384       INT16 sCellX, sCellY;
00385 
00386       // Get X, Y world GRID Coordinates
00387       sWorldY = ( usMapPos / WORLD_COLS );
00388       sWorldX = usMapPos - ( sWorldY * WORLD_COLS );
00389 
00390       // Convert into cell coords
00391       sCellY = sWorldY * CELL_Y_SIZE;
00392       sCellX = sWorldX * CELL_X_SIZE;
00393 
00394       // Add center tile positions
00395       *psXPos = sCellX + ( CELL_X_SIZE / 2 );
00396       *psYPos = sCellY + ( CELL_Y_SIZE / 2 );
00397       
00398       return( TRUE );
00399 }

00401 void GetScreenXYWorldCoords( INT16 sScreenX, INT16 sScreenY, INT16 *psWorldX, INT16 *psWorldY )
00402 {
00403       INT16 sOffsetX, sOffsetY;
00404       INT16 sTempPosX_W, sTempPosY_W;
00405       INT16 sStartPointX_W, sStartPointY_W;
00406        
00407       // Convert mouse screen coords into offset from center
00408       sOffsetX = sScreenX - ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2;
00409       sOffsetY = sScreenY - ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2;
00410 
00411       FromScreenToCellCoordinates( sOffsetX, sOffsetY, &sTempPosX_W, &sTempPosY_W );
00412 
00413       // World start point is Render center plus this distance
00414       sStartPointX_W = gsRenderCenterX + sTempPosX_W;
00415       sStartPointY_W = gsRenderCenterY + sTempPosY_W;
00416 
00417       // Determine Start block and render offsets
00418       // Find start block
00419       // Add adjustment for render origin as well
00420       (*psWorldX) = sStartPointX_W;
00421       (*psWorldY) = sStartPointY_W;
00422 
00423 }

00449 void GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( INT32 sWorldCellX, INT32 sWorldCellY, INT16 *psWorldScreenX, INT16 *psWorldScreenY )
00450 {
00451       INT16 sScreenCenterX, sScreenCenterY;
00452       INT16 sDistToCenterY, sDistToCenterX;
00453       
00454       // Find the diustance from render center to true world center
00455       sDistToCenterX = ( sWorldCellX * CELL_X_SIZE ) - gCenterWorldX;
00456       sDistToCenterY = ( sWorldCellY * CELL_Y_SIZE ) - gCenterWorldY;
00457       
00458 
00459       // From render center in world coords, convert to render center in "screen" coords
00460 
00461       // ATE: We should call the fowllowing function but I'm putting it here verbatim for speed
00462       //FromCellToScreenCoordinates( sDistToCenterX , sDistToCenterY, &sScreenCenterX, &sScreenCenterY );
00463       sScreenCenterX = ( 2 * sDistToCenterX ) - ( 2 * sDistToCenterY );
00464       sScreenCenterY = sDistToCenterX + sDistToCenterY;
00465 
00466       // Subtract screen center
00467       *psWorldScreenX = sScreenCenterX + gsCX - gsTLX;
00468       *psWorldScreenY = sScreenCenterY + gsCY - gsTLY;
00469 
00470 }
00471 
00472 
00473 void GetFromAbsoluteScreenXYWorldXY( INT32 *psWorldCellX, INT32* psWorldCellY, INT16 sWorldScreenX, INT16 sWorldScreenY )
00474 {
00475       INT16 sWorldCenterX, sWorldCenterY;
00476       INT16 sDistToCenterY, sDistToCenterX;
00477       
00478       // Subtract screen center
00479       sDistToCenterX = sWorldScreenX - gsCX + gsTLX;
00480       sDistToCenterY = sWorldScreenY - gsCY + gsTLY;
00481       
00482       // From render center in world coords, convert to render center in "screen" coords
00483 
00484       // ATE: We should call the fowllowing function but I'm putting it here verbatim for speed
00485       //FromCellToScreenCoordinates( sDistToCenterX , sDistToCenterY, &sScreenCenterX, &sScreenCenterY );
00486       sWorldCenterX = ( ( sDistToCenterX + ( 2 * sDistToCenterY ) ) / 4 ); 
00487       sWorldCenterY = ( ( 2 * sDistToCenterY ) - sDistToCenterX ) / 4; 
00488 
00489       // Goto center again
00490       *psWorldCellX = sWorldCenterX + gCenterWorldX;
00491       *psWorldCellY = sWorldCenterY + gCenterWorldY;
00492 
00493 }

00496 // UTILITY FUNTIONS
00497 
00498 INT32 OutOfBounds(INT16 sGridno, INT16 sProposedGridno)
00499 {
00500  INT16 sMod,sPropMod;
00501 
00502  // get modulas of our origin
00503  sMod = sGridno % MAXCOL;
00504 
00505  if (sMod != 0)         // if we're not on leftmost grid
00506   if (sMod != RIGHTMOSTGRID)  // if we're not on rightmost grid
00507     if (sGridno < LASTROWSTART)     // if we're above bottom row
00508       if (sGridno > MAXCOL)   // if we're below top row
00509        // Everything's OK - we're not on the edge of the map
00510        return(FALSE);
00511 
00512 
00513   // if we've got this far, there's a potential problem - check it out!
00514 
00515  if (sProposedGridno < 0)
00516     return(TRUE);
00517 
00518  sPropMod = sProposedGridno % MAXCOL;
00519 
00520  if (sMod == 0 && sPropMod == RIGHTMOSTGRID)
00521    return(TRUE);
00522  else
00523   if (sMod == RIGHTMOSTGRID && sPropMod == 0)
00524       return(TRUE);
00525  else
00526   if (sGridno >= LASTROWSTART && sProposedGridno >= GRIDSIZE)
00527       return(TRUE);
00528   else
00529        return(FALSE);
00530 }
00531 
00532 
00533 
00534 INT16 NewGridNo(INT16 sGridno, INT16 sDirInc)
00535 {
00536  INT16 sProposedGridno = sGridno + sDirInc;
00537 
00538  // now check for out-of-bounds 
00539  if (OutOfBounds(sGridno,sProposedGridno))
00540             // return ORIGINAL gridno to user
00541             sProposedGridno = sGridno;
00542 
00543  return(sProposedGridno);
00544 }
00545 
00546 
00547 INT16 DirectionInc(INT16 sDirection)
00548 {
00549  if ((sDirection < 0) || (sDirection > 7))
00550   {
00551 
00552 //#ifdef BETAVERSION
00553 //   NumMessage("DirectionInc: Invalid direction received, = ",direction);
00554 //#endif
00555 
00556    //direction = random(8);   // replace garbage with random direction
00557        sDirection = 1;
00558   }
00559 
00560  
00561  return(DirIncrementer[sDirection]);
00562 }
00563 
00564 BOOLEAN CellXYToScreenXY(INT16 sCellX, INT16 sCellY, INT16 *sScreenX, INT16 *sScreenY)
00565 {
00566 INT16 sDeltaCellX, sDeltaCellY;
00567 INT16 sDeltaScreenX, sDeltaScreenY;
00568 
00569       sDeltaCellX=sCellX-gsRenderCenterX;
00570       sDeltaCellY=sCellY-gsRenderCenterY;
00571 
00572       FromCellToScreenCoordinates(sDeltaCellX, sDeltaCellY, &sDeltaScreenX, &sDeltaScreenY);
00573 
00574       *sScreenX=(((gsVIEWPORT_END_X-gsVIEWPORT_START_X)/2)+sDeltaScreenX);
00575       *sScreenY=(((gsVIEWPORT_END_Y-gsVIEWPORT_START_Y)/2)+sDeltaScreenY);
00576 
00577       return(TRUE);
00578 
00579 }
00580 
00581 void ConvertGridNoToXY( INT16 sGridNo, INT16 *sXPos, INT16 *sYPos )
00582 {
00583       *sYPos = sGridNo / WORLD_COLS;
00584       *sXPos = ( sGridNo - ( *sYPos * WORLD_COLS ) );
00585 }
00586 
00587 void ConvertGridNoToCellXY( INT16 sGridNo, INT16 *sXPos, INT16 *sYPos )
00588 {
00589       *sYPos = ( sGridNo / WORLD_COLS );
00590       *sXPos = sGridNo - ( *sYPos * WORLD_COLS );
00591 
00592       *sYPos = ( *sYPos * CELL_Y_SIZE );
00593       *sXPos = ( *sXPos * CELL_X_SIZE );
00594 }
00595 
00596 void ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( INT16 sGridNo, INT16 *sXPos, INT16 *sYPos )
00597 {
00598       *sYPos = ( sGridNo / WORLD_COLS );
00599       *sXPos = ( sGridNo - ( *sYPos * WORLD_COLS ) );
00600 
00601       *sYPos = ( *sYPos * CELL_Y_SIZE ) + ( CELL_Y_SIZE / 2 );
00602       *sXPos = ( *sXPos * CELL_X_SIZE ) + ( CELL_X_SIZE / 2 );
00603 }
00604 
00605 INT32 GetRangeFromGridNoDiff( INT16 sGridNo1, INT16 sGridNo2 )
00606 {
00607       INT32                         uiDist;
00608       INT16                         sXPos, sYPos, sXPos2, sYPos2;
00609 
00610       // Convert our grid-not into an XY
00611       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo1, &sXPos, &sYPos );
00612 
00613       // Convert our grid-not into an XY
00614       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo2, &sXPos2, &sYPos2 );
00615 
00616       uiDist = (INT16)sqrt((double) ( sXPos2 - sXPos )*( sXPos2 - sXPos ) + ( sYPos2 - sYPos ) * ( sYPos2 - sYPos ) );  
00617 
00618       return( uiDist );
00619 }
00620 
00621 INT32 GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( INT16 sGridNo1, INT16 sGridNo2 )
00622 {
00623       INT16                         sXPos, sYPos, sXPos2, sYPos2;
00624 
00625       // Convert our grid-not into an XY
00626       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo1, &sXPos, &sYPos );
00627 
00628       // Convert our grid-not into an XY
00629       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo2, &sXPos2, &sYPos2 );
00630 
00631       return( (INT32)( sqrt((double) ( sXPos2 - sXPos ) * ( sXPos2 - sXPos ) + ( sYPos2 - sYPos ) * ( sYPos2 - sYPos ) ) ) * CELL_X_SIZE );     
00632 
00633 }
00634 
00635 BOOLEAN IsPointInScreenRect( INT16 sXPos, INT16 sYPos, SGPRect *pRect )
00636 {
00637       if ( (sXPos >= pRect->iLeft) && (sXPos <= pRect->iRight) && (sYPos >= pRect->iTop) && (sYPos <= pRect->iBottom) )
00638       {
00639             return( TRUE );
00640       }
00641       else
00642       {
00643             return( FALSE );
00644       }
00645 }
00646 
00647 BOOLEAN IsPointInScreenRectWithRelative( INT16 sXPos, INT16 sYPos, SGPRect *pRect, INT16 *sXRel, INT16 *sYRel )
00648 {
00649       if ( (sXPos >= pRect->iLeft) && (sXPos <= pRect->iRight) && (sYPos >= pRect->iTop) && (sYPos <= pRect->iBottom) )
00650       {
00651             (*sXRel) = pRect->iLeft - sXPos;
00652             (*sYRel) = sYPos - (INT16)pRect->iTop;
00653 
00654             return( TRUE );
00655       }
00656       else
00657       {
00658             return( FALSE );
00659       }
00660 }
00661 
00662 
00663 INT16 PythSpacesAway(INT16 sOrigin, INT16 sDest)
00664 {
00665       INT16 sRows,sCols,sResult;
00666 
00667       sRows = abs((sOrigin / MAXCOL) - (sDest / MAXCOL));
00668       sCols = abs((sOrigin % MAXROW) - (sDest % MAXROW));
00669 
00670  
00671       // apply Pythagoras's theorem for right-handed triangle:
00672       // dist^2 = rows^2 + cols^2, so use the square root to get the distance
00673       sResult = (INT16)sqrt((double) (sRows * sRows) + (sCols * sCols));
00674 
00675       return(sResult);
00676 }
00677 
00678 
00679 INT16 SpacesAway(INT16 sOrigin, INT16 sDest)
00680 {
00681  INT16 sRows,sCols;
00682 
00683  sRows = abs((sOrigin / MAXCOL) - (sDest / MAXCOL));
00684  sCols = abs((sOrigin % MAXROW) - (sDest % MAXROW));
00685 
00686       return( __max( sRows, sCols ) );
00687 }
00688 
00689 INT16 CardinalSpacesAway(INT16 sOrigin, INT16 sDest) 
00690 // distance away, ignoring diagonals!
00691 {
00692  INT16 sRows,sCols;
00693 
00694  sRows = abs((sOrigin / MAXCOL) - (sDest / MAXCOL));
00695  sCols = abs((sOrigin % MAXROW) - (sDest % MAXROW));
00696 
00697       return( (INT16)( sRows + sCols ) );
00698 }
00699 
00700 INT8 FindNumTurnsBetweenDirs( INT8 sDir1, INT8 sDir2 )
00701 {
00702       INT16 sDirection;
00703       INT16 sNumTurns = 0;
00704       
00705       sDirection = sDir1;
00706 
00707       do
00708       {
00709 
00710             sDirection = sDirection + QuickestDirection( sDir1, sDir2 );
00711 
00712             if (sDirection > 7)
00713             {
00714                    sDirection = 0;
00715             }
00716             else
00717             {
00718                   if ( sDirection < 0 )
00719                   {
00720                         sDirection = 7;
00721                   }
00722             }
00723 
00724             if ( sDirection == sDir2 )
00725             {
00726                   break;
00727             }
00728 
00729             sNumTurns++;
00730 
00731             // SAFEGUARD ! - if we (somehow) do not get to were we want!
00732             if ( sNumTurns > 100 )
00733             {
00734                   sNumTurns = 0;
00735                   break;
00736             }
00737       } while( TRUE );
00738 
00739       return( (INT8)sNumTurns );
00740 }
00741 
00742 
00743 BOOLEAN FindHeigherLevel( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bStartingDir, INT8 *pbDirection )
00744 {
00745       INT32             cnt;
00746       INT16             sNewGridNo;
00747       BOOLEAN           fFound = FALSE;
00748       UINT8             bMinNumTurns = 100;
00749       INT8              bNumTurns;
00750       INT8              bMinDirection = 0;
00751 
00752       // IF there is a roof over our heads, this is an ivalid....
00753       // return ( FALSE );l
00754       if ( FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ROOF ) != NULL )
00755       {
00756             return( FALSE );
00757       }
00758             
00759       // LOOP THROUGH ALL 8 DIRECTIONS
00760       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 8; cnt+= 2 )
00761       {
00762             sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)cnt ) );
00763       
00764             if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sNewGridNo, TRUE, 1 ) )
00765             {
00766                   // Check if this tile has a higher level
00767                   if ( IsHeigherLevel( sNewGridNo ) )
00768                   {
00769                         fFound = TRUE;
00770 
00771                         // FInd how many turns we should go to get here
00772                         bNumTurns =  FindNumTurnsBetweenDirs( (INT8)cnt, bStartingDir );
00773 
00774                         if ( bNumTurns < bMinNumTurns )
00775                         {
00776                               bMinNumTurns = bNumTurns;
00777                               bMinDirection = (INT8)cnt;
00778                         }
00779                   }
00780             }
00781       }
00782 
00783       if ( fFound )
00784       {
00785             *pbDirection = bMinDirection;
00786             return( TRUE );
00787       }
00788 
00789       return( FALSE );
00790 }

00792 BOOLEAN FindLowerLevel( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bStartingDir, INT8 *pbDirection )
00793 {
00794       INT32             cnt;
00795       INT16             sNewGridNo;
00796       BOOLEAN           fFound = FALSE;
00797       UINT8             bMinNumTurns = 100;
00798       INT8              bNumTurns;
00799       INT8              bMinDirection = 0;
00800 
00801       // LOOP THROUGH ALL 8 DIRECTIONS
00802       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 8; cnt+= 2 )
00803       {
00804             sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)cnt ) );
00805       
00806                   // Make sure there is NOT a roof here...
00807                   // Check OK destination
00808                   if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sNewGridNo, TRUE, 0 ) )
00809                   {
00810                         if ( FindStructure( sNewGridNo, STRUCTURE_ROOF ) == NULL )
00811                         {
00812                               {
00813                                     fFound = TRUE;
00814 
00815                                     // FInd how many turns we should go to get here
00816                                     bNumTurns =  FindNumTurnsBetweenDirs( (INT8)cnt, bStartingDir );
00817 
00818                                     if ( bNumTurns < bMinNumTurns )
00819                                     {
00820                                           bMinNumTurns = bNumTurns;
00821                                           bMinDirection = (INT8)cnt;
00822                                     }
00823 
00824                               }
00825                         }
00826                   }
00827       }
00828 
00829       if ( fFound )
00830       {
00831             *pbDirection = bMinDirection;
00832             return( TRUE );
00833       }
00834 
00835       return( FALSE );
00836 }
00837 
00838 
00839 INT16 QuickestDirection(INT16 origin, INT16 dest)
00840 {
00841  INT16 v1,v2;
00842 
00843  if (origin==dest)
00844      return(0);
00845 
00846  if ((abs(origin - dest)) == 4)
00847      return(1);         // this could be made random
00848  else
00849   if (origin > dest)
00850    {
00851     v1 = abs(origin - dest);
00852     v2 = (8 - origin) + dest;
00853     if (v1 > v2)
00854        return(1);
00855     else
00856       return(-1);
00857    }
00858   else
00859    {
00860     v1 = abs(origin - dest);
00861     v2 = (8 - dest) + origin;
00862     if (v1 > v2)
00863        return(-1);
00864     else
00865        return(1);
00866    }
00867 }
00868 
00869 
00870 INT16 ExtQuickestDirection(INT16 origin, INT16 dest)
00871 {
00872  INT16 v1,v2;
00873 
00874  if (origin==dest)
00875      return(0);
00876 
00877  if ((abs(origin - dest)) == 16)
00878      return(1);         // this could be made random
00879  else
00880   if (origin > dest)
00881    {
00882     v1 = abs(origin - dest);
00883     v2 = (32 - origin) + dest;
00884     if (v1 > v2)
00885        return(1);
00886     else
00887       return(-1);
00888    }
00889   else
00890    {
00891     v1 = abs(origin - dest);
00892     v2 = (32 - dest) + origin;
00893     if (v1 > v2)
00894        return(-1);
00895     else
00896        return(1);
00897    }
00898 }

00901 // Returns the (center ) cell coordinates in X
00902 INT16 CenterX( INT16 sGridNo ) 
00903 {
00904       INT16 sYPos, sXPos;
00905 
00906       sYPos = sGridNo / WORLD_COLS;
00907       sXPos = ( sGridNo - ( sYPos * WORLD_COLS ) );
00908 
00909       return( ( sXPos * CELL_X_SIZE ) + ( CELL_X_SIZE / 2 ) );
00910 }
00911 
00912 
00913 // Returns the (center ) cell coordinates in Y
00914 INT16 CenterY( INT16 sGridNo ) 
00915 {
00916       INT16 sYPos, sXPos;
00917 
00918       sYPos = sGridNo / WORLD_COLS;
00919       sXPos = ( sGridNo - ( sYPos * WORLD_COLS ) );
00920 
00921       return( ( sYPos * CELL_Y_SIZE ) + ( CELL_Y_SIZE / 2 ) );
00922 }

00929       sYPos = sGridNo / WORLD_COLS;
00930       sXPos = ( sGridNo - ( sYPos * WORLD_COLS ) );
00931 
00932       return( sXPos );

00939 
00940       sYPos = sGridNo / WORLD_COLS;
00941       sXPos = ( sGridNo - ( sYPos * WORLD_COLS ) );

00947 
00948 BOOLEAN GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( INT16 sGridNo )
00949 {
00950       INT16 sWorldX;
00951       INT16 sWorldY;
00952       INT16 sXMapPos, sYMapPos;
00953 
00954       // Check for valid gridno...
00955       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sXMapPos, &sYMapPos );
00956 
00957       // Get screen coordinates for current position of soldier
00958       GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( sXMapPos, sYMapPos, &sWorldX, &sWorldY);
00959 
00960       if ( sWorldX > 0 && sWorldX < ( gsTRX - gsTLX - 20 ) &&
00961                    sWorldY > 20     && sWorldY < ( gsBLY - gsTLY - 20 ) )
00962       {
00963             return( TRUE );
00964       }
00965 
00966       return( FALSE );
00967 }

00970 // This function is used when we care about astetics with the top Y portion of the
00971 // gma eplay area
00972 // mostly due to UI bar that comes down....
00973 BOOLEAN GridNoOnVisibleWorldTileGivenYLimits( INT16 sGridNo )
00974 {
00975       INT16 sWorldX;
00976       INT16 sWorldY;
00977       INT16 sXMapPos, sYMapPos;
00978 
00979       // Check for valid gridno...
00980       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sXMapPos, &sYMapPos );
00981 
00982       // Get screen coordinates for current position of soldier
00983       GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( sXMapPos, sYMapPos, &sWorldX, &sWorldY);
00984 
00985       if ( sWorldX > 0 && sWorldX < ( gsTRX - gsTLX - 20 ) &&
00986                    sWorldY > 40     && sWorldY < ( gsBLY - gsTLY - 20 ) )
00987       {
00988             return( TRUE );
00989       }
00990 
00991       return( FALSE );
00992 }

00995 BOOLEAN GridNoOnEdgeOfMap( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 * pbDirection )
00996 {
00997       INT8        bDir;
00998 
00999       // check NE, SE, SW, NW because of tilt of isometric display
01000 
01001       for (bDir = NORTHEAST; bDir < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; bDir += 2 )
01002       {
01003             if (gubWorldMovementCosts[ (sGridNo + DirectionInc( bDir ) ) ][ bDir ][ 0 ] == TRAVELCOST_OFF_MAP)
01004             //if ( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16) (sGridNo + DirectionInc( bDir ) ) ) )
01005             {
01006                   *pbDirection = bDir;
01007                   return( TRUE );
01008             }
01009       }
01010       return( FALSE );
01011 }

01013 
01014 BOOLEAN FindFenceJumpDirection( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bStartingDir, INT8 *pbDirection )
01015 {
01016       INT32             cnt;
01017       INT16             sNewGridNo, sOtherSideOfFence;
01018       BOOLEAN           fFound = FALSE;
01019       UINT8             bMinNumTurns = 100;
01020       INT8              bNumTurns;
01021       INT8              bMinDirection = 0;
01022 
01023       // IF there is a fence in this gridno, return false!
01024       if ( IsJumpableFencePresentAtGridno( sGridNo ) )
01025       {
01026             return( FALSE );
01027       }
01028 
01029       // LOOP THROUGH ALL 8 DIRECTIONS
01030       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 8; cnt+= 2 )
01031       {
01032             // go out *2* tiles
01033             sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)cnt ) );
01034             sOtherSideOfFence = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sNewGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)cnt ) );
01035       
01036             if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sOtherSideOfFence, TRUE, 0 ) )
01037             {
01038                   // ATE: Check if there is somebody waiting here.....
01039 
01040 
01041                   // Check if we have a fence here
01042                   if ( IsJumpableFencePresentAtGridno( sNewGridNo ) )
01043                   {
01044                         fFound = TRUE;
01045 
01046                         // FInd how many turns we should go to get here
01047                         bNumTurns =  FindNumTurnsBetweenDirs( (INT8)cnt, bStartingDir );
01048 
01049                         if ( bNumTurns < bMinNumTurns )
01050                         {
01051                               bMinNumTurns = bNumTurns;
01052                               bMinDirection = (INT8)cnt;
01053                         }
01054                   }
01055             }
01056       }
01057 
01058       if ( fFound )
01059       {
01060             *pbDirection = bMinDirection;
01061             return( TRUE );
01062       }
01063 
01064       return( FALSE );
01065 }
01066 
01067 //Simply chooses a random gridno within valid boundaries (for dropping things in unloaded sectors)
01068 INT16 RandomGridNo()
01069 {
01070       INT32 iMapXPos, iMapYPos, iMapIndex;
01071       do
01072       {
01073             iMapXPos = Random( WORLD_COLS );
01074             iMapYPos = Random( WORLD_ROWS );
01075             iMapIndex = iMapYPos * WORLD_COLS + iMapXPos;
01076       }while( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16)iMapIndex ) );
01077       return (INT16)iMapIndex;
01078 }
